page.title: 13 STRATFORD MOP FAIR CONT'D
page.content: RIDES COST FROM 50p UPWARDS AND FOOD- STALLS SELLING CANDY FLOSS,HOT DOGS ETC ARE ALSO EXPENSIVE.THE MUSIC,LIGHTS AND SCREAMING CONTRIBUTE TO THE EXCITEMENT WHICH ATTRACTS PEOPLE TO THE RIDES: THERE ARE SLOW RIDES FOR YOUNGSTERS EG. ROUNDABOUTS AND FASTER,MORE DANGEROUS ONES FOR TEENAGERS EG."THE ZIPPER" AND THE "TIPTOP". IT COVERS THE WHOLE OF THE TOWN-CENTRE WHICH LEADS TO VARIOUS PROBLEMS.TRAFFIC CONGESTION ARISES BECAUSE ROADS ARE SHUT OFF SO DIVERSIONS ARE NEEDED. PUBLIC TRANSPORT IS ALSO DISRUPTED SO MOST LOCAL SCHOOLS ARE CLOSED FOR THE DAY.OTHER PROBLEMS SUCH AS LITTER AFTER THE MOP HAS GONE CAUSE OFFENCE TO LOCAL INHABITANTS.THE CRIME-RATE RISES WITH PETTY CRIMES EG.VANDALISM AND STEALING. OBVIOUSLY THERE IS A RISK OF INJURY FROM THE RIDES BUT THIS DOES NOT REDUCE THE GENERAL EXCITEMENT ON MOP DAY.
